Title: Episode 3
Plot: Sam is called to a murder at a textile mill, the site of his bachelor flat in 2006. DCI Hunt suspects an outspoken union rep, but Sam tries to use his knowledge of forensic science to find the killer.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Tony Marshall (III), Noreen Kershaw, Rafaella Hutchinson, Rebecca Atkinson, Andrew Knott, John Henshaw, John Axon, Lee Ross, Warren Donnelly, Nicky Bell, Denice Hope, Paul Leeming
